nodes.bodyText: Given that WarmUpService interface is supported everywhere, can we move this interface into LoadBalancer (or merge them) and have an impl in LoadBalancerWithFacilitiesDelegator to save a lot of code?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -50,7 +51,8 @@

  */
-public class LastSeenLoadBalancerWithFacilities implements LoadBalancerWithFacilities {
+public class LastSeenLoadBalancerWithFacilities implements LoadBalancerWithFacilities, WarmUpService

nodes.bodyText: Great suggestion. Can we do this refactoring as part of a different pull request so that we can unblock the LastSeen rollout quickly?
